name: Rei Taro

Skilled in building high-performance **RESTful APIs** and utilizing **SQL** databases, along with front-end technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Tailwind CSS**. Throughout my career, I've contributed to impactful projects for esteemed organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
